title: A Forest

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Grow another tree at night (2 night cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are 10 trees in the same person. Every time you die, you lose a tree. This includes hanging and modkills
-When someone attacks you, they have 10 seconds to confirm they’re moving out of the way otherwise they are dealt a basic attack. The host should ping them about this after processing actions.
-If you lose all of your trees, anyone without invincible defense dies because there is no longer enough oxygen being produced
-You can regrow a tree every 3 nights in an attempt to prevent the death of the forest
-You may not grow a tree on N1 and N2
-You may reroll this for free if you desire

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game and have grown at least 2 extra trees

desc:
Post 3214
_Yes, it’s literally just a forest_
